section.title: Overview of platforms and operating systems
section.para: ooRexx is built on both native platforms and in virtual machines. This is a listing of all the platforms 2025-04-05 in the order of appearance:

section.para: ooRexx is built on these platforms

listitem.para: Marks-M4-Mac Mark Hesslings M4 Mac on ARM64 hardware, running macOS 15.3.1 (Sequoia);

section.title: Overview of Windows VMs
section.para: ooRexx is built and tested on these platforms in 32 and 64 bit versions, No installers for these platforms are uploaded, rather the installers build for Windows 10 on pos-Windows are used for all supported versions of Windows (see below):

listitem.para: pos-vbox-Windows7 VM with 1CPU, 2GB memory, 500GB SSD, build and test 32 and 64-bit ooRexx
pos-vbox-Windows8 VM with 1CPU, 2GB memory, 500GB SSD, build and test 32 and 64-bit ooRexx
pos-vbox-Windows10 VM with 1CPU, 2GB memory, 500GB SSD, build and test 32 and 64-bit ooRexx
pos-vbox-Windows11 VM with 1CPU, 2GB memory, 100GB SSD, build and test 32 and 64-bit ooRexx

section.title: Overview of macOS VMs
section.para: There are currently no macOS VMs for building ooRexx. Builds and tests are made for High Sierra on Intel hardware and for Sequoia on Intel and ARM64 (M or Apple Silicon hardware). There is a "Fat" binary uploaded that can be used on both platforms for all supported OS versions from High Sierra and forward.
